page.title: 09Cisswood Restaurant
page.content:
The Cisswood is a hotel and restaurant. There are 8 hotel rooms and 120 people can be seated at once in the restaurant. About 300 to 400 go there each week. They are open every day from noon until after the last customer leaves. They have 8 full and 20 part time employees. They have 12 set menus and the average cost of a meal is between Â£12 and Â£14. The most popular dishes are sole and steak. Each week they buy
120 lbs meat from Smithfield 12-15 stones fish from Billingsgate and vegetables from Covent Garden
By Thomas Laidler and Daniel Harewood
